name: Twitter Bookmarks Bot
description: This app allows you to send Tweets to a Twitter bot and archive them for later elsewhere.

BOOKMARKS_MODE.description: Where should your tweets be archived to? (case-insensitive, either AIRTABLE or WEBHOOK)

TESSDATA_PREFIX.description: The folder Tesseract is installed in

AIRTABLE_BASE.description: The Airtable base to store your bookmarks in. (ignored if in Webhook mode)

AIRTABLE_TABLE.description: The Airtable table to store your bookmarks in. (ignored if in Webhook mode)

AIRTABLE_API_KEY.description: Your Airtable API key. (ignored if in Webhook mode)

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Your Twitter API access token secret.

WEBHOOK_URL.description: The webhook endpoint to send Tweets to. (ignored if in Airtable mode)
